sentence: …Administrative Procedure Act (APA) but excludes       certain categories of rules from coverage. We conclude that       the withdrawal of the Reporting Requirements meets the APA       definition of a rule, and no CRA exception applies.       Therefore, the withdrawal of the Reporting Requirements is a       rule subject to CRA's submission requirements.…
